Title: Relates to prohibiting contracts between municipalities and law enforcement for the purpose of school safety in municipalities with populations of more than one million
Summary: Prohibits contracts between municipalities and law enforcement for the purpose of school safety in municipalities with populations of more than one million; voids contracts that have previously been made.
LawCode: Add ยง209-vv, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting contracts between municipalities and law enforcement for the purpose of school safety in municipalities with populations of more than one million
